SKLEP Witaj w Sklepie! Potrzebujesz trochę Żetonów? Chcesz zakupić skiny wieżyczek? Mamy tutaj to czego chcesz! Witaj w Sklepie. Potrzebujesz przewagi nad Bloonami? Potrzebujesz więcej Żetonów? Nie martw się mamy tutaj wszystko czego potrzebujesz. HALA SŁAWY Witaj w Hali Sławy. Tutaj możesz znaleść każde zdobyte osiągnięcie w grze. Witaj w Hali Sławy. Tutaj możesz znaleść każde zdobyte osiągnięcie w grze. Jeżeli masz połączenie z Game Center możesz także rywalizować na tablicy wyników oraz rzucać wyzwanie znajomym. MAŁPIE LABORATORIUM Ulepszenia laboratorium zwiększą ci przewagę na polu bitwy za każdym razem jak zagrasz! Żeby fundować badania, potrzebujesz żetonów, które zdobędziesz przechodząc mapy i misje specjalne. Laboratorium pokazuje ile wymaga żetonów na następne ulepszenie. SKLEP WIEŻ W tym specjalnym sklepie możesz zakupić wieżyczki i Specjalnych Agentów! Gdy jakiegoś kupisz, zostanie w twoim ekwipunku i będziesz mógł go postawić za darmo, gdziekolwiek i kiedykolwiek zechcesz, wspomagając twoją wojnę z bloonami! WIEŻE Każda wieża ma 2 ścieżki ulepszeń, które zapewniają szereg potężnych ulepszeń i umiejętności. Ten ekran umożliwia przeglądanie ulepszeń dla każdej wieży i sprawdzanie, ile PD jest wymagane do ich odblokowania. Każda wieża ma 2 ścieżki ulepszeń, które zapewniają szereg potężnych ulepszeń i umiejętności. Ten ekran umożliwia przeglądanie ulepszeń dla każdej wieży i sprawdzanie, ile PD jest wymagane do ich odblokowania. SPECJALNE BUDYNKI Kup ziemię, aby uzyskać dostęp do fajnych budynków specjalnych, które ulepszają każdą wieżę. Możesz mieć aktywny tylko jeden budynek na raz, ale każdy budynek zapewnia 3 główne ulepszenia i dodatkowe specjalne ulepszenie czwartego poziomu. PASEK WDRAŻANIA To jest pasek wdrażania agentów i zdolności. Stąd możesz przeciągać Agentów na pole bitwy, tak jak zwykłe wieże.\n\nZdolności są nieco inne. Gdy odblokujesz zdolność, zostanie ona dodana do paska wdrażania i po prostu dotknij ikony, aby ją aktywować. Umiejętność wtedy zacznie się odnawiać i nie będzie można jej ponownie aktywować, dopóki licznik czasu się nie zresetuje.
Aktualizuj Twój zapis został stworzony na nowszej wersji. Proszę zaktualizować do najnowszej wersji, aby mieć pewność, że zachowasz swoje dane.

Armed with sharp acorns, this special agent goes berserk when bloons leak. For a few seconds, he attacks super fast, can spot Camo, and pop lead. Pro Upgrade - Anger Mismanagement! Despite counseling, the squirrel agent is even angrier. He gets so worked up that every 50 acorns he goes berserk even if bloons haven't leaked, attacking super fast, spotting Camo, and popping lead. Grows bananas that you can tap to collect for cash. The Covert Ops Battles Response Agent provides good support in the battlefield with his unique abilities. His standard issue pistol pops 2 layers of bloon per shot. Tired of picking up all those bananas yourself? So is this guy but at least he's paid to do it. Farmer will auto-gather all bananas in his radius so you don't have to. Shoots 4 spike balls in cardinal directions, each spike ball can pop 2 bloons. The Beekeeper has a hive of angry bees that zip to their targets and sting bloons until all layers are popped. Stingers can't pop lead but Regrower Bloons beware. Placed directly on the track, each glob of glue can slow down 20 bloons. Plant this fast-growing bloon killer right on the track. Loses a thorn for each bloon popped, but grows 10 thorns between each round (up to 200). Rapidly sucks up and shreds bloons, spitting what's left out the back. Hurls a spiked ball that pops everything it touches. The Bloonsday Device gives you temporary control of the orbital strike satellite, whose beam destroys all bloons and does big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Shoots a single bomb that explodes in a radius burst. Can pop lead bloons. Throws a single boomerang in an arc, can pop 3 bloons. Strzela rzutkami jak karabin maszynowy, at any position you tap. Rzuca pojedynczą rzutką, która przebija pojedynczy bloon. Placed directly on the track, these explode after 3 seconds. Rzuca pojedyńczą rzutką która roztrzaskuje pojedyńczy bloon. Powerful attack helicopter armed with twin dart shooters and multiple patrol options. Temporarily freezes nearby bloons. Frozen bloons are immune to sharp objects. Meerkat Spy has no attack, but instead uses his super keen senses to spot Camo Bloons, granting Camo Detection for all towers within his radius. Pro Upgrade - Cyber Eye! No longer weaponless, the Meerkat Pro can now blast any single bloon into dust and help put the hurt on MOAB-class bloons. Grants Camo detection to all towers in his radius. Patrols the skies above the action, blasting the area with 8 powerful darts. Rzuca magiczne bełty, które mogą popować do 2 bloonów. Shoots a heavy dart that can pop 5 bloons each, from both sides of the ship. Water only. Uses a powerful nail gun, and builds traps, sentries, and enhancers. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Water based tower that shoots homing darts. Can upgrade to shoot at Bloons in the radius of any other tower. Can also upgrade to submerge and become a support tower. Reduces cost of all towers and upgrades in radius by 10%. Launches explosive mortar shells to a single targeted spot. Throws sharp shurikens rapidly and can see Camo bloons. Ninja Kiwi kopie tak szybko że blóny latają do tyłu. Pro-Ulepszenie - Jeszcze szybsze kopy które teraż mogą też zniszczyć ołów. The best selection of Captain Cassie's comrades with powerful pistols and pirate skills. More efficient near a Buccaneer. Place almost any land tower on water with the Pontoon! Deploy the pontoon on water, then place your land tower on top. Nowhere to float your boat? Smart monkeys know they can place a Portable Lake on land, allowing any water unit to be deployed within its waters. Nowhere to float your boat? Smart monkeys know they can place a Portable Lake on land, allowing any water unit to be deployed within its waters. These slick prehistoric predators orbit their nest and pop any regular bloons they hit, but they can only pop so many before a new one has to hatch. Pro Upgrade - Radderdactyls! Bigger wing blow back bloons with each flap, and they can pop far more regular bloons before going back to the nest. Placed directly on the track, each pack of spikes can pop 10 bloons. Pops 2 layers off of bloons, with unlimited range. Each round generates piles of road spikes that can pop 5 bloons each. Throws darts bloon-meltingly fast. It's a bird. It's a plane. It's a squadron of flying super-powered laser-beamin' monkeys who destroy every single bloon on screen and do big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Pro Upgrade - Double Storm! A second pass of Super Monkeys follows the first after a short delay, destroying every bloon on screen and damaging MOAB-classes. Shoots 8 tacks spread in all directions, each tack can pop 1 bloon. Tribal Turtle can live on land or water. Throws spears and coconuts, coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons. Pro Upgrade - Ambidexterity! Elite training allows the Turtle Pro to throw spear and coconut simultaneously for maximum bloon hurt. Coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons.

MORE BANANAS\nGrows 6 bunches of bananas each round. BANANA PLANTATION\nGrows 13 bunches of bananas each round. BANANA REPUBLIC\nGrows 25 bunches of bananas each round. BANANA RESEARCH FACILITY\nProduces 10 boxes of bananas each round. Each box is worth 10 bunches of bananas. EZ SALVAGE\nBananas last twice as long and, if left uncollected, still give 75% of their cash value. VALUABLE BANANAS\nEach bunch or box of bananas is worth 25% more cash. MONKEY BANK\nGenerates stored cash that earns 10% each round and holds up to $5000. BANANA INVESTMENTS ADVISORY\n20% interest each round instead of 10% and storage for $20,000.
SUCKIER\nIncreased suction sucks bloons in faster. HEAVY DUTY SUCTION\nHigher wattage motor allows for sucking in heavier bloons, such as Leads and Ceramics, and shreds 2 layers of bloon instead of 1. DUAL CORE BLADES\nDual layer blade array takes off 4 layers of bloon, and stronger core engine can suck in MOABs and BFBs, which will be shredded for up to 6.5 seconds before being ejected. SUPER WIDE FUNNEL\nStronger funnel engine and blades are capable of shredding entire Rainbows at once and sucking ZOMG Bloons with brute force! LONG RANGE SUCK\nIncreases suction range FASTER SHRED\nMore efficient internal componentry decreases the time bloons take to be shredded. TRIPLE BARREL\nTriple barrels provide the most efficient bloon shredding possible. SUPA-VAC\nHuge burst of suction power brings all nearby non-MOAB class bloons towards it and holds them there until they are sucked into the tower. Lasts 8 seconds.
EXTRA RANGE\nGives tower longer attack range. FRAG BOMBS\nEach explosion throws out 8 sharp fragments for more popping. CLUSTER BOMBS\nThrows out secondary bombs instead of frags. BLOON IMPACT\nBloons become stunned for a short time when they are hit. BIGGER BOMBS\nLarger blast area and more bloons hit per explosion. MISSILE LAUNCHER\nMore velocity and range, more damage, and faster firing. MOAB MAULER\nInflicts x10 damage on MOAB class bloons. MOAB ASSASSIN\nAbility: deadly missile seeks the nearest MOAB class bloon and inflicts heavy damage to it.
MULTI-TARGET\nBoomerangs can now pop 7 bloons each. GLAIVE THROWER\nThrows sharper, faster, bigger glaives instead of boomerangs. GLAIVE RICOCHET\nGlaives now automatically bounce from bloon to bloon. GLAIVE LORD\nThree permanent glaives orbit the tower. SONIC BOOM\nSonic boomerangs fly faster and can be thrown more frequently. RED HOT RANGS\nRed hot boomerangs can melt through lead and frozen bloons and deal extra damage to MOAB-class. BIONIC BOOMER\nThrows boomerangs much faster. TURBO CHARGE\nAbility: attacks incredibly fast and does double damage for 10 seconds.
FOCUSED FIRING\nGreatly reduces the spread of the gun. FASTER BARREL SPIN\nMakes gun fire much faster. LASER CANNON\nRapid fire plasma can pop 13 bloons each and also pops frozen bloons. RAY OF DOOM\nThe Ray of Doom is a persistent solid beam of bloon destruction. POWERFUL DARTS\nShots move faster and can pop 2 more bloons each. Increases Ray of Doom damage. DEPLETED BLOONTONIUM\nShots can now pop all bloon types. HYDRA ROCKET PODS\nShoots vicious little missiles instead of darts. Hydra rockets have sharp tips that can pierce black bloons. BLOON AREA DENIAL SYSTEM\nFires three hydra rockets per shot instead of one. Ability: shoots 5 waves of missiles toward the nearest 100 bloons on screen
DALEKOSIĘŻNE RZUTKI\nSprawiają że Małpa rzutkowa rzuca dalej niż normalnie. WSPOMAGANIE WZROKU\nRzuca jeszcze dalej i widzi bloony Kamo. KUSZA\nUżywa kuszy która może popować 3 warstwy bloona na każde trafienie. STRZELEC WYBOROWY\nCo kilka strzałów, pocisk zadaje krytyczne obrażenia, niszcząc wszelkie przekłute balony i rozdrabniając klasę MOAB. OSTRE RZUTKI\nPopuje 1 dodatkowy bloon. BARDZO OSTRE RZUTKI\nPopuje 2 dodatkowe bloony na rzut. POTRÓJNE RZUTKI\nRzuca 3 rzutkami na raz. FANKLUB SUPER MAŁP\nZdolność: nawet 10 pobliskich małpek stają się Super przez 10 sekund.
GLUE SOAK\nGlue soaks through all layers of bloon. CORROSIVE GLUE\nGlued bloons pop one layer every few seconds. BLOON DISSOLVER\nExtreme solvents melt two layers every second. BLOON LIQUEFIER\nLiquefies bloons, popping them ten times every second! STICKIER GLUE\nMakes glue effect last much longer. GLUE SPLATTER\nSplatters glue across 6 bloons at a time. GLUE HOSE\nShoots glue more than 3x as fast! GLUE STRIKER\nAbility: glues everything on the screen temporarily.
QUAD DARTS\nShoots 4 darts per volley instead of 2. PURSUIT\nSuperior targeting computers enable a new targeting option to pursue bloons. RAZOR ROTORS\nRotor blades rip up bloons on contact, including frozen and lead. APACHE DARTSHIP\nAdds a large missile array and a powerful machine gun. BIGGER JETS\nMore powerful jets enable the Heli to move much faster. ENHANCED IFR INSTRUMENTS\nAllows Heli Pilot to detect and shoot Camo bloons. DOWNDRAFT\nBlows bloons away from the Heli. SUPPORT CHINOOK\nAbilities: drops med and cash crates, or can pick up and reposition most towers.
ENHANCED FREEZE\nLarger freeze area that freezes bloons for longer. SNAP FREEZE\nPops a layer off of each bloon frozen. VIRAL FROST\nFrozen bloons freeze other bloons that come in contact. ARCTIC WIND\nSuper cold aura that slows all bloons in its larger radius. PERMAFROST\nBloons move slowly even after thawing out. DEEP FREEZE\nFreezes 2 layers, extending the slow duration. ICE SHARDS\nRazor sharp shards fly out when frozen bloons pop. ABSOLUTE ZERO\nAbility: freezes all bloons on screen temporarily.
RAPID FIRE\nShoots faster than normal. SHARPER DARTS\nMonkey Ace darts can pop 8 bloons each! NEVA-MISS TARGETING\nDarts seek out and pop bloons intelligently. SPECTRE\nFlying fortress of bloon doom. PINEAPPLE PRESENT\nDrops an exploding pineapple every 3 seconds. SPY PLANE\nAllows the Monkey Ace to hit Camo bloons. OPERATION: DART STORM\nMore darts = win. GROUND ZERO\nAbility: drops a devastating bomb that destroys all bloons and damages MOAB class.
INTENSE MAGIC\nShoots larger and more powerful magical bolts. LIGHTNING BOLT\nUnleash the power of lightning to zap many bloons at once. SUMMON WHIRLWIND\nWhirlwind blows bloons off the path away from the exit. TEMPEST TORNADO\nPops bloons and blows them faster, further and more often. Also improves lightning bolt attack. FIREBALL\nThe Apprentice adds a powerful fireball attack to its arsenal. MONKEY SENSE\nAllows the Monkey Apprentice to hit Camo bloons. DRAGON'S BREATH\nSpews endless flames at nearby bloons. SUMMON PHOENIX\nAbility: super powerful phoenix wreaks bloon havoc for 20 seconds.
FASTER SHOOTING\nBuccaneer and nearby Crew shoot faster. LONGER CANNONS\nMuch longer range. Nearby Crew get +3 range. DESTROYER\nAttacks super duper fast! Replaces big darts with smaller, weaker double darts for maximum efficiency. AIRCRAFT CARRIER\nLaunches fast strafing Monkey Ace pilots. GRAPE SHOT\nAdds a spray of 4 sharp grapes. CROW'S NEST\nAllows Buccaneer and nearby Crew to hit Camo bloons. CANNON SHIP\nMore powerful main cannon fires bombs in addition to darts, and more powerful side cannons fire more grapes, all at increased range. MONKEY PIRATES\nSide cannons now also fire bombs. Ability: grapples the strongest bloon on screen (max BFB) and brings it down. Nearby Crew get triple damage for 8 seconds.
SENTRY GUN\nCreates temporary sentry guns and deploys them nearby. FAST ENGINEERING\nIncreased build speed produces sentry guns more often. CLEANSING FOAM\nSprays foam that removes Camo and Regen, and pops leads. BLOON TRAP\nTrap captures bloons until full; can be emptied for cash. 9-INCH NAILS\nMassive nails pop 8 bloons at once, including frozen bloons LARGER SERVICE AREA\nShoot further and deploy sentries in a larger area. SPROCKETS\nIncreases Sentry and nail gun fire rate appreciably. OVERCLOCK\nAbility: target tower becomes super powered for 60 seconds.
BARBED DARTS\nMakes the Submarine's darts pop up to 3 bloons each. ADVANCED INTEL\nAllows long range targeting of bloons that are in the radius of your other towers. SUBMERGE AND SUPPORT\nActivate submerge using target option to permanently reveal Camo bloons in its radius. BLOONTONIUM REACTOR\nActivate submerge using target option to detect Camo, pop bloons, and reduce water tower cooldowns by 15% (doesn't stack). TWIN GUNS\nAdded twin gun doubles attack speed. AIRBURST DARTS\nAirburst darts split into 3 on impact for massively increased popping power. BALLISTIC MISSILE\nBallistic missile seeks its target over any distance and does extra damage to Ceramic and MOAB class bloons. FIRST STRIKE CAPABILITY\nAbility: a devastating missile strike on the largest bloon on screen. Destroys up to a ZOMG bloon in one go, or many lesser bloons.
MONKEY BEACON\nIncreases attack range by 15% of all towers in its radius. JUNGLE DRUMS\nJungle drums inspire nearby towers to attack 15% faster. MONKEY TOWN\nBloons popped by towers in range of the Monkey Town get 50% more cash per pop. ENERGY BEACON\nReduces nearby ability cooldowns by 20% and adds an electrical laser attack that deals big damage to a single target. MONKEY FORT\nIncreases the pierce of all nearby towers by 1. RADAR SCANNER\nAllows all towers within its radius to hit Camo bloons. MONKEY INTELLIGENCE BUREAU\nAllows all nearby towers to pop all bloon types. MIB CALL TO ARMS\nAbility: doubles attack speed and pierce for towers in radius for 10 seconds
INCREASED ACCURACY\nMakes the Mortar's shots more accurate. BIGGER BLAST\nHeavy ordinance delivers a bigger explosion radius. BLOON BUSTER\nSmash through 2 layers of bloons at once! THE BIG ONE\nDevastating explosions each pop 5 layers of bloon. RAPID RELOAD\nIncrease the attack speed of the Mortar. BURNY STUFF\nPops additional bloons 2 seconds after impact. SIGNAL FLARE\nCamo Bloons popped by flares permanently lose their Camo. ARTILLERY BATTERY\nAbility: immobilizes and bombards the entire screen for 5 seconds.
NINJA DISCIPLINE\nIncreases attack range and attack speed. SHARP SHURIKENS\nShurikens can pop 4 bloons each. DOUBLE SHOT\nThrows 2 shurikens at once. BLOONJITSU\nThrows 5 shurikens at once! SEEKING SHURIKEN\nShuriken will seek out and pop bloons automatically. DISTRACTION\nSome bloons become distracted and move the wrong way. FLASH BOMB\nSometimes throws a flash bomb that stuns multiple bloons. SABOTAGE SUPPLY LINES\nAbility: Lasts for 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all new bloons are crippled to half speed.
FULL METAL JACKET\nShots can pop through 4 layers of bloon. Can pop lead and frozen. POINT FIVE OH\nShots can pop through 7 layers of bloon! DEADLY PRECISION\nErases 18 layers of bloon per shot - enough to destroy a ceramic. CRIPPLE MOAB\nImmobilizes MOAB class bloons for a short time. FASTER FIRING\nAllows Sniper to shoot faster. NIGHT VISION GOGGLES\nAllows Sniper to detect and shoot Camo bloons. SEMI AUTOMATIC RIFLE\nAllows Sniper to take multiple shots and attack 3x as fast. SUPPLY DROP\nAbility: drops a crate full of cash.
BIGGER STACKS\nGenerates larger piles of Spikes per shot. WHITE HOT SPIKES\nCuts through lead like a hot spike through... lead. SPIKED BALL FACTORY\nProduces sharp spiked balls that do extra damage to ceramics. SPIKED MINES\nSpiked balls explode when they lose all their spikes. FASTER PRODUCTION\nIncreases the rate of Spike production. EVEN FASTER PRODUCTION\nRate of spike production increases even more. MOAB-SHREDR SPIKES\nSuper-Hard-Rending-Engine-Driven-Razors shred MOAB class bloons. SPIKE STORM\nAbility: Lays down a thick carpet of Spikes over the whole track.
LASER BLASTS\nFast firing twin laser beams pop twice as much as before. PLASMA BLASTS\nPlasma vaporizes everything it touches. SUN AVATAR\nIt is said that bloons dare not touch the sun. SUN TEMPLE\nTower sacrifices enhance and modify the Temple's awesome arsenal. SUPER RANGE\nSuper Monkey with super range = good! EPIC RANGE\nWhy settle for super when you can have EPIC? ROBO MONKEY\nHalf Super Monkey, half killer robot of death. TECHNOLOGICAL TERROR\nAbility: destroys all bloons within radius of tower - completely and utterly.
FASTER SHOOTING\nShoots tacks faster. EVEN FASTER SHOOTING\nShoots tacks even faster! TACK SPRAYER\nSprays out 16 tacks per volley instead of the usual 8. RING OF FIRE\nShoots a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks. EXTRA RANGE TACKS\nTacks fly out further than normal. SUPER RANGE TACKS\nTacks go much further than normal. BLADE SHOOTER\nShoots out big razor sharp blades. BLADE MAELSTROM\nAbility: covers the area in a storm of blades.

Na Łatwym wieże kosztują mniej niż na średnim, Bloony poruszają się troszkę wolniej i masz 200 żyć. Za pokonanie 50 rundy na Łatwym otrzymasz brązowy medal dla tego toru. Na Średnim twoje wieże kosztują normalną ilość i masz 150 żyć. Za pokonanie 65 rundy na Średnim otrzymasz srebrny medal dla tego toru. Na Trudnym wieże kosztują wiecej niż na średnim, Bloony poruszają się troszkę szybciej i masz 100 żyć. Za pokonanie 85 rundy na Trudnym otrzymasz złoty medal dla tego toru. Na Niepopowalnym wieże kosztują wiecej niż na Trudnym, Bloony poruszają się szybciej oraz są mocniejsze niż kiedykolwiek. Nie możesz stracić ani jednego życia. Za pokonanie 100 rundy na Niepopowalnym otrzymasz czarny medal honoru dla tego toru. Kiedy zaczniesz, nie możesz zatrzymać. Bloony będą się pojawiać póki nie przegrasz. Jak daleko zajdziesz? Zacznij z $50,000. Nie zarobisz żadnej gotówki podczas rozgrywki. Rozpoczynasz na rundzie 30 i farmy bananów oraz inne zdolości generujące pieniądze są wyłączone. Jak daleko zajdziesz? Tryb Piaskownicy pozwala ci przetestować różne wieże, taktyki i wszystko to co chcesz w otwartym i fajnym środowisku. Dziesięć. Ukończ mapę, używając tylko oryginalnych małpek oraz tych, które pojawiły się w BTD5.
Bułka z masłem. Baw się, odblokowując wszystkie nowe ulepszenia wieży i odkrywając, co robią. Oprócz tego, że mają więcej warstw, różnokolorowe bloony poruszają się szybciej. Graj regularnie w Bloons TD 5 i sprawdzaj nowe aktualizacje - tory, wieże, misje i inne niesamowitości. Pierwsze Zielone Bloony nadchodzą w następnej rundzie. Im częściej korzystasz z danej wieży, tym więcej jej ulepszeń odblokujesz. Każda wieża ma 2 ścieżki ulepszeń, ale dodatkowe specjalne 3cie i 4te ulepszenia można uzyskać tylko na jednej ze ścieżek. Bloony staną się teraz trudniejsze, przychodzą w ciasnych pęczkach, aby się przebić lub polegać na czystych liczbach. W następnej kolejności nadchodzi kilka Niebieskich Bloonów, potem jeszcze kilka, potem jeszcze kilka, potem jeszcze więcej. Stare dobre Żółte Bloony. Dość szybkie, całkiem spore i dosyć niebezpieczne.. Czy zabezpieczyłeś swoje wyjścia? Jeśli nie grałeś w więcej gier Ninja Kiwi, powinieneś - ponieważ te gry są fajne, a zabawa jest dobra. Po odblokowaniu nowej wieży zostanie ona odblokowana na stałe. Użyj większej liczby wież określonego rodzaju, aby szybciej odblokować ich ulepszenia. Masz trochę darmowych pieniędzy dzięki nadchodzących 80 zieloniutkich. Nadciągają białe bloony. Odporne na zamrażanie. To był tylko jeden Kamo bloon. Wypróbuj kolce drogowe, jeśli Twoje wieże go przegapiły. Wkrótce będzie ich więcej, więc przygotuj się!! Ołowiaki są powolne i łatwe do pokonania, jeśli masz odpowiednie wieże, ale ostre rzeczy po prostu ich nie porysują. W następnej rundzie jest dużo Camo Bloons - rozważ drogę Małpiej Ninja. Tęczowe balony, całkiem szybkie, całkiem wrednie i całkiem ładne. W końcu to tęcze, prawda? Strzeż się rundy 42... Więcej bloonów Kamo. Wkrótce. Zostałeś ostrzeżony. Następna runda oddziela silnych od słabych. Wykrywanie kamuflażu i szybkie zadawanie obrażeń dla Regenów. Budujemy trochę gniazdka, prawda? Zastanów się dokładnie, na co je wydać - pieniądze na popy stają się coraz mniejsze. Masz już jakieś Super Małpy? Ok, przyspieszmy trochę, dobrze? Gdzieś, nad Tęczami... Nadchodzi Kamo + Ołów. Podobało ci się to BFB, prawda? Następna runda będzie w @#$% trudna. Zbliża się ostatnia runda dla średniego poziomu trudności. Graj dalej, ucz się dalej. Jest też dla ciebie żeton po 100 rundzie. Popuję, przeto jestem. Gratulacje, że zaszedłeś tak daleko. Gotowy na całą masę Ceramików, która przebije się przez twoją obronę? Możesz iść dalej, ale pamiętaj, aby poświęcić czas na robienie rzeczy innych niż BTD5. Jak jeść i wychodzić na zewnątrz.. Nadchodzi Regen i Kamo. Niezbyt zabawne ani uczciwe, prawda? Jeśli grasz na trudnym poziomie trudności, dobrze poradziłeś sobie, by zajść tak daleko. Oczywiście to wszystko skończy się na następnym poziomie. To jest ostatni odcinek. Jeśli zdołasz przejść do 100 rundy, naprawdę podbijesz ten tor. Jednak prawdopodobnie nie. Przynajmniej dobrze się bawiłeś.. Pokonałeś ZOMG. Czy masz to, czego potrzeba, aby pokonać DDT i supergromady MOABów? Gratulacje za przejście ostatniej rundy. Otrzymujesz żeton.

Czarne i białe bloony są małe, ale zawierają dwa różowe. Czarne bloony są odporne na eksplozje, a Białe bloony na zamrażanie. Bloony zebra są odporne na oba! Ołowiane bloony poruszają się powoli, ale są odporne na wszystko, co ostre. Zawierają dwa czarne bloony. Kamo bloony są bardzo niebezpieczne, ponieważ większość wież nie może ich trafić. Każdy bloon może być Kamo, podobnie jak wszystkie bloony, które z niego wyjdą. Mogą one zostać trafione tylko przez Wieże, które mogą wykryć bloony Kamo, takie jak Małpia Ninja. W sytuacji awaryjnej użyj kolców drogowych, aby je przebić. Bloons mają nowy potężny postęp: regeneracja. Z wyglądu w kształcie serca, przywrócą warstwy do pierwotnego rozmiaru, jeśli nie zostaną szybko wystrzelone. Strzeż się! Ceramiczne bloony są wykonane z gliny i wymagają 10 trafień, aby je zniszczyć. Mają w sobie 2 tęczowe bloony. Bloony klasy MOAB (MOABy, BFB i ZOMGi) wymagają setek trafień, aby pękły. Na szczęście dla ciebie poruszają się dość wolno. Jeśli którykolwiek z nich przejdzie, gra jest skończona. To jest ZOMG. Zeppelin Potężnej Ogromności. Popowanie go jest bardzo, bardzo, ciężkie. Masz agenta specjalnego. Są to przedmioty jednorazowego użytku, które mogą pomóc Ci wygrać. Niektóre przedmioty to wieże, które są umieszczane, inne to specjalne moce, które są aktywowane. Możesz zobaczyć, ilu posiadasz z każdego agenta specjalnego, dotykając przycisku Gwiazdka z mocami specjalnymi. Masz agenta specjalnego. Są to przedmioty jednorazowego użytku, które mogą pomóc Ci wygrać. Niektóre przedmioty to wieże, które są umieszczane, inne to specjalne moce, które są aktywowane. Możesz zobaczyć, ilu posiadasz z każdego agenta specjalnego, na pasku wdrażania u dołu ekranu. Jedna z twoich wież ma teraz zdolność aktywowaną. Są to niezwykle potężne umiejętności, które można wykorzystać, gdy wpadniesz w kłopoty. Każda umiejętność jest w trakcie „ochładzania”, zanim będzie mogła zostać ponownie użyta. Możesz użyć zdolności, dotykając przycisku Gwiazda mocy specjalnych, a następnie dotykając ikony umiejętności. Jedna z twoich wież ma teraz zdolność aktywowaną. Są to niezwykle potężne umiejętności, które można wykorzystać, gdy wpadniesz w kłopoty. Każda umiejętność jest w trakcie „ochładzania”, zanim będzie mogła zostać ponownie użyta. Możesz użyć zdolności, dotykając ikon zdolności nad paskiem rozstawienia. Masz farmę bananów! Te farmy generują banany automatycznie w każdej rundzie. Zamień banany na gotówkę, dotykając bananów. Nie czekaj zbyt długo - banany zepsują się po 10 sekundach, jeśli nie zostaną zebrane. Masz helikopter! Ten potężny śmigłowiec szturmowy ma wiele opcji patrolowania. Wybierz między trybami Za Dotykiem, Zablokuj, Patrol, gdzie będzie latać między dwoma punktami, oraz Ścigaj. To jest tryb Free Play. Zdobywasz PD wolniej, ale możesz zdobyć token i dostać się do rankingów. Niektóre rundy stają się później dość ciężkie, więc Twoje urządzenie w końcu zacznie się opóźniać - powodzenia! Kup tutaj wieże i umieść je wokół toru, aby przebić nadchodzące bloony. Popowanie bloonów daje gotówkę na zakup większej liczby wież lub ulepszenie istniejących. Inżynier został dodany do twojego wyposażenia wieżyczek! Ta wieża jest wyposażona w potężny pistolet na gwoździe i ma wiele przydatnych ulepszeń, które tworzą pułapki, wartowniki i inne ulepszenia. Twój u-boot może teraz zanurzać się i zapewniać wsparcie dla innych wież. Aktywuj tryb zanurzenia, przechodząc przez opcje celowania. Gratulacje, udało Ci się rozpakować wystarczająco dużo Bloonów, aby rozpakować tajemniczą przesyłkę. Kliknij w prezent, aby odkryć prezent w środku! Pamiętaj, że jesteś w trybie odysei, twoje życie musi przetrwać wiele torów! Powodzenia! Automatyczne rozpoczęcie rundy jest teraz włączone. Po włączeniu nie ma przerw między rundami, a następna fala Bloonów pojawi się automatycznie. Tę opcję można wyłączyć w menu ustawień.

Strzelce Bomb z ulepszeniem MOAB Mauler zadają duże obrażenia balonom klasy MOAB Nawet balony klasy MOAB są podatne na wysoką szybkostrzelność Super Małpy Gotówka z Farm Bananów może być niezbędna do wygrywania na trudniejszych poziomach trudności Użycie specjalnych agentów wystarczająco dużo razy odblokuje na stałe ich potężną wersję Pro Użyj żetonów w Małpim Laboratorium, aby zapewnić niewielkie stałe ulepszenia początkowej gotówki, szybkości ataku i innych Budynki specjalne zapewniają ich wieżą obniżoną cenę, szybsze ataki i niesamowite unikalne moce Dotknij przycisków informacyjnych w całej grze, aby wyświetlić opisy i wyjaśnienia Masz problem z umieszczeniem wież dokładnie tam, gdzie chcesz? Spróbuj opcji “Przeciąganie” w Ustawieniach lub pauzie Stuknij w codzienną skrzynię z nagrodami każdego dnia, aby zdobywać coraz więcej darmowej Małpiej Gotówki Spróbuj zmienić niektóre ustawienia ataku swoich wież z „Pierwsze” na „Silne”. Umieść wieże na skrzyżowaniach i narożach torów, aby uzyskać maksymalną wydajność
Prywatny Hangar Ace PRYWATNY HANGAR ACE Zmniejsza koszt wieży Małpich Samolotów i ich ulepszeń o 5% Chłodziwo do Dział\n\nZwiększa prędkość ataku o 10% Montaż Działek\n\nDodaje szybkostrzelnych strzelców z przodu Przeguby Obrotowe\n\nPrzedni strzelcy mogą strzelać we wszystkie strony Zwiększa koszt Małpich Piratów i ich ulepszeń o 5%

4 of a Kind Complete all daily challenges in one day. Completed all daily challenges in one day.
Perfect Week Complete all daily challenges in a week. Completed all daily challenges in a week.
Centurion Complete 100 daily challenges. Completed 100 daily challenges.
Monkey Lane, Easy Win using only Dart, Sniper, Ninja, and Bomb towers.
Bloon Circles, Easy Win using only Tack, Boomerang, Apprentice, and Glue towers. $800 starting cash.
Park Path, Easy Win using only Buccaneer, Monkey Ace, Ice, and Dartling towers. $1000 starting cash.
Mount Magma, Easy Win using only Boomerang, Super Monkey, Monkey Village, and Mortar Monkeys
Archipelago, Deflation Survive through wave 65 using only Buccaneer, Bomb, Apprentice, and Glue towers
Switch, Easy Win using only Boomerang, Ninja, Bomb, and Monkey Ace towers. $800 starting cash.
Monkey Lane, Apopalypse Survive through wave 65 using only Sniper, Ninja, Apprentice, and Dartling towers. $800 starting cash.
Park Path, Medium Win using only Tack, Sniper, Banana Farm, Monkey Ace, and Mortar Monkeys. $800 starting cash. Watch those Camos!
Ice And Fire Win using only Ice, Apprentice, Bomb, and Mortar Monkeys, plus Pineapples for good measure.
Castle, Easy Win using only Dart, Boomerang, Buccaneer, and Apprentice towers
Bloon Circles, Deflation Survive through wave 65 using only Dart, Ninja, Bomb, and Mortar Monkeys
Pass 10 Epic Rounds With Lots O' Cash Start on round 86 and pass round 95 with $200,000. All towers, instant epic.
Archipelago, Medium Win using only Dart, Apprentice, Buccaneer, and Monkey Village towers
Super Clock Win using only Dart Monkeys, Super Monkeys, and Monkey Village towers, plus Pineapples.
Where'd My Towers Go? Pass rounds 10 to 45 using only Road Spikes, Pineapples and Banana Farms!
Strapped for Cash Pass 50 rounds with zero starting cash. Use Special Agents to help you through the early rounds, but don't spend too much Monkey Money!
Harrison's Challenge Player designed challenge - beat Monkey Lane on Hard using Tack, Bomb, Apprentice, and Dartling towers. Camo Leads could be tricky.
Switch It Up Beat the Switch using only Dart, Apprentice, Ice, and Super Monkey towers.
Davy Jones' Locker The fleet has been sunk! Survive 65 rounds on the high seas with no Monkey Buccaneers or Pirate Crew.
Ice, Wind, & Fire The elemental powers shall rule this day. Can they survive 85 relentless rounds? $1000 cash to start.
Dart Monkeys Aplenty Pass the first 40 rounds using only Dart Monkeys! No Special Agents allowed, but Pineapples and Road Spikes are fair game.
Classic BTD Dart Towers, Tack Towers, Bomb Shooters, Ice Monkeys, Super Monkeys, and Spike Ball Shooters only. Just like in BTD1. Pass 50 rounds on Easy on the Original track. No Special Agents allowed.
Long Siege Start at round 10 and pass round 100. All towers available, and you start with $3000 and 400 lives.
Air And Sea Using only Buccaneers and Monkey Aces, pass 50 rounds on the tricky Castle track set to Easy difficulty. Start with $850.
Apopalypse Now Can the soldier monkeys prevent the Apopalypse? Dartling, Mortar, and Sniper Monkeys must survive through round 40, with Banana Farm and Pineapple support. $4000 to start.
Crop Dusting DDT did a job on me! Can Aces and Glue Gunners do a job on on 65 rounds of bloons? Dust 'em! Farms, Pineapples, and $2000 to start. Plan for those Camo Leads.
Two Of A Kind Pairs for the win! All towers available, but you must beat 85 rounds with no more than 2 of any tower and Agent type.
Time's Up Cheat time for 50 rounds using only Boomerang, Bomb, Monkey Ace, and Dartling Towers. $1000 starting cash.
Sniper Alley Can Snipers win the war against 50 rounds of bloons when you only have 1 life? $1000 to start, Farms and Pineapples, no Agents.
Pirates And Ninjas A fearsome duo those Pirates and Ninjas - can they survive 65 rounds with only Villages, Farms, and Pineapples to support them?
A Stroll Down Monkey Lane Monkey Lane becomes a warzone! Spend your starting cash wisely and hold out till round 50. You only have 50 lives, so be careful!
Roger That Gold Leader Can you land your Monkey Aces on your Buccaneers? More importantly, can you survive 50 waves of bloodthirsty bloons?
Mortar And Dart Using only Mortar Monkeys and level 1 Dart Monkeys, can you pass 50 rounds?
Nature Calls You are given 10 Bloonberry Bushes, a Beekeeper, and 5 Super Monkey Storms for free. All Towers disabled except Super Monkeys, who are limited. Pass round 55.
Plumb In Front Get to round 40 on the Switch track using only Dart Monkeys, Tack Towers, Boomerangs and Ice Monkeys. 5 towers max at a time.
It Takes A Village Survive to round 60 in Apopalypse mode with just Boomerang, Bomb and Ice Monkeys, as well as the Monkey Village. Road Spikes and Pineapples available.
A Cool Challenge Beat The Rink on Hard with only Dart, Bomb and Village. Road Spikes are allowed but Special Agents are not.
One Ring To Rule Them All Beat Mount Magma, Medium using only 1 of any given tower. No Monkey Villages, Road Spikes or Pineapples.
Heart Of The Maelstrom Shred your way through 20 rounds from rounds 40-60 using only Tack Towers. A free Meerkat is added to help you with the Camo rounds.
Martial Arts Masters Pass Switch on Medium with Boomerangs and Ninjas. Pineapples and Road Spikes allowed.
Low Tek Pass The Rink on Easy. But your towers cannot be upgraded and Road Spikes and Pineapples are disabled. Not so easy now is it?
Deflate the Clock Start on round 30 and pass round 50 in Deflation mode.
Classic Beat Original on Easy using only Dart Monkeys (1,1), Tack Shooters (1,1), Ice Monkeys (1,0), Bomb Shooters (1,1), Super Monkeys (0,1), and Spike Ball Shooters (0,0). No bloons are Camo.
Bombs, Glue, Village Pass Easy Castle Track using only Bomb Shooters, Glue Gunners, and Villages with a little bit extra starting cash. Road Spikes and Pineapples allowed.
ZOMG Pass round 85, Medium, Monkey Lane. $40,000.
One Rink To Rule Them All Beat The Rink on Medium using only 1 of any given tower. No Villages, Road Spikes, or Pineapples.
Ninja Glue On The Farm With Ninjas, Glue and Banana Farms only, defeat Park Path on Medium.
Storm At Sea Use Buccaneers, Pirate Crew, and Monkey Apprentices to beat Benguela on Medium, rounds 35 through 65.
Switch It Up Beat Switch on Medium using partially upgradeable Dart, Tack and Bomb towers with access to full Mortar Monkeys. You receive a bonus Meerkat and Bloonberry Bush.
Icebreaker Beat The Rink on Easy using Buccaneers, Bomb Shooters, and Boomerang Monkeys.
Banned: Camo Detection Can you survive 36 rounds without Camo Detection?
Super Glue Vacation Beat first 65 rounds of Hard on Switch without using Super Monkeys or Glue Gunners.
Building The Ark Use up to two each of Ninjas, Dart Monkeys, Buccaneers, Snipers and Monkey Apprentices to clear Park Path on Medium.
Mount Boom Mount Magma on Medium using Boomerang, Monkey Ace and Dartling Gunners. Partial Banana Farm upgrades. Beekeeper and 2 Angry Squirrels to get you started.
Time Goes On Beat the Clock on Medium using Ice Monkeys, Sniper Monkeys (4,2), Tack Towers, Boomerang Monkeys, and Bomb Shooters.
Yin Test your knowledge of the unseen path. Defeat 85 rounds on the Rink using only the first path of your abilities.
Yang This time you will face 85 rounds on Park Path, and you must test only the second path of your abilities.
Deflated Beat rounds 30 to 60 on Mount Magma in Deflation using 4 towers at most and without Villages or Super Monkeys.
It's Apopalypse Again Beat Apopalypse Monkey Lane round 40 using unupgraded Dart Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Ice Monkeys, Tack Towers, Ninjas, and Spike Factories.
B Day Yes, Bloonsday has come to Monkey Lane.
The Big Bang Beat Hard on Park Path with Bomb Shooters, Mortar Monkeys, Monkey Aces, Monkey Buccaneers (4,2), and Pineapples.
Ice, Ice Baby Beat Bloon Circles on Easy using Sniper Monkeys and Ice Monkeys.
Ride The Lightning Beat round 85 on the Rink Easy using Monkey Monkey Apprentices (4,2), Banana Farms, and Monkey Villages.
Firestorm Defeat Archipelago on Hard using Monkey Apprentices, Farms, Villages, Road Spikes, and Pineapples. One Tribal Turtle provided.
Mortar In The Mount Use Mortar Monkeys only to pass rounds 10 to 60 on Mount Magma Easy. $2000 starting cash. Road Spikes allowed.
Hard? That Was Easy. Reach round 45 Apopalypse on Castle using Spike Factories, Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooter, Glue Gunners and Buccaneers. You start with $8000 cash.
Look Left Beat Park Path on Medium difficuly using only the left towers! No Special Agents.
Look Right Beat Bloon Circles on Easy difficulty using only the right towers! No Special Agents.
Cross The Road Beat Park Path on Hard difficulty using a criss-cross selection of towers! No Special Agents.
Tacktics Pass round 60 on Park Medium difficulty using only Tack Tower (3,2), Spike Factory (2,4), and Road Spikes. Special Agents allowed.
Another Icebreaker Rink on Medium difficulty using only Sniper Monkeys and Buccaneers. Pass round 65 to win! Special Agents allowed. No Road Spikes or Pineapples.
Green Eyed Monsters Archipelago Easy with only Super Monkeys limited to 0-2 range upgrades. 8 Tribal Turtles and a single Meerkat Spy should help with the tricky rounds.
That Was Quick Pass the infamous Hard difficulty Ceramic bloon destruction round with just $25,000 cash and no Special Agents.
Slowed And Steady Bloon Circles with only Sniper Monkeys and Glue Gunners. No Special Agents. Pass round 46 on Easy.
Monkey Strike Beat Medium Switch without using Monkey Towers. Two Tribal Turtles and a Beekeeper will help out.
The Power Of Three... Types Of Towers. Pass Mount Magma using only Monkey Apprentices, Boomerang Monkeys, and Ninja Monkeys. Medium difficulty.
A Walk In The Park Beat Hard difficulty with only Dart Monkeys. A Tribal Turtle and Meerkat Spy are provided if you can't handle it.
Bullseye Using only Dartling Gunners, pass Clock on Medium difficulty. 950 cash to start you off.
Upon The Boiling Seas With only Buccaneers, pass Archipelago on Medium. No Special Agents.
The Three Ninjas How long can you survive with just three Ninja Monkeys on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 rounds to win!
The Whirling Trio How long can you survive with just three Boomerang Monkeys on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 rounds to win!
The Color Of Magic How long can you survive with just three Monkey Apprentices on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 rounds to win!
Bombs, Ice, And Fire Using Bomb Shooters, Ice Monkeys, and Tack Towers (4,2), beat The Rink Medium difficulty. One Meerkat for Camo detection.
Monkey River With nothing but monkeys, beat River Medium difficulty starting from round 46 with 18,000 cash.
Nine by Three Maximum of 9 towers. No more than 3 of each. Beat Branching Bay on Medium. No Special Agents, Road Spikes, Pineapples, Banana Farms, or supply drop Snipers.
Darts Galore Using only towers that shoot, throw or otherwise propel darts, pass Archipelago on Hard difficulty. No Special Agents.
Enhanced Bombardment Bombard your way through Monkey Lane on Easy using Bomb Shooters, Mortar Monkeys and Exploding Pineapples. No Special Agents.
Mechanically Inclined With Boomerang Monkeys (2,4) and Super Monkeys (2,4) pass Switch on Medium. One Meerkat Provided.
Budget Cuts Pass Castle Medium with no Banana Farms, Road Spikes or Pineapples and upgrades limited to 2,2.
Don't Pollute the River! Beat Snake River Medium Difficulty with only Spike Factories. 900 cash to start with.
A Small Selection With a few non-upgradeable towers pass Monkey Lane on Easy. No Special Agents.
Bloonstopping Beat Switch Medium Difficulty using only 2,4 Ninja Monkeys, 4,2 Bomb Shooters, 2,4 Glue Gunners and Ice Monkeys. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Fight Fire with Fire Beat Mount Magma on Hard with fire and explosives.
Boomer-Vanced Aircraft Monkey Lane Medium with Boomerang Monkeys and Monkey Aces (4th upgrades disabled). 100 Lives. No Special Agents.
You Stay On Your Side Left side can only use left upgrades. Right side can only use right upgrades. Pass Bloon Circles on Hard from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
We Need to Go Faster Some towers can upgrade their attack speed. With those towers and the paths with speed upgrades beat Park on Easy.
Bad Aim Beat Monkey Lane Easy with Dartling Gunners (0,3) and Monkey Aces(2,3). Start with 810 cash and 50 lives.
BBBB Snake River Medium with Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Buccaneers and Banana Farms. Only Special Agents starting with "B"
Wait, What? Can you get what's necessary before it's too late? Rink Hard difficulty. Finish after you beat round 50.
Excuse Me, This Is Our Side Left side can only use right upgrades. Right side can only use left upgrades. Pass Snake River on Hard from round 30 with 8,000 cash. 'Cause Eros asked for it.
Eight's Unlucky 7 towers or fewer on Clock Hard. No Road Spikes or Pineapples. Start from round 13 with 3,333 cash.
Special Assets Pass Castle Medium, rounds 30-85 starting with 8,000 cash. Tack Towers, Snipers, Bombs, Buccaneers(4,2), Aces, Mortars and Dartlings. 50 lives. No Special Agents.
You've Got On The Hat Some monkeys wear hats. With those monkeys only, beat Monkey Lane Easy.
Maul Those MOABs! With Bomb Shooters (2,3), Super Monkeys (2,3) and Spike Factories (2,3) beat The Rink medium starting with 14,000 cash on round 46. One Meerkat provided.
One at a Time, Please With only attacking towers that hit one bloon per projectile, beat Monkey Lane easy. Upgrades that break that rule are disabled.
An Unlikely Trio With a Buccaneer, Ice Monkey and Spike Factory beat Park medium difficulty.
The Glue, the BADS and the Factory Using a Glue Gunner, a Dartling Gunner (2,4) and a Spike Factory beat Snake River on Medium. Start on round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Tribal Warfare Using primitive Boomerang Monkeys (2,2) and Banana Farms (2,2) beat Bloon Circles on Medium. Two Tribal Turtles, and two Meerkats have come to your aid.
Bionic Artillery With no more than three of each, use Boomerang Monkeys (2,4) and Mortar Monkeys to beat Monkey Lane easy from round 30. Start with 3000 cash.
Dart Shortage A guerrilla bloon strike has created a dart shortage at the front. Without dart wielding towers beat The Rink on easy from round 10.
Liquid Hot Magma Using only Tack Towers and Spike Factories beat Mount Magma easy from round 20 with 4,000 cash.
Specialization Start at round 20 with 4,000 cash. Only Tack Towers (3,4), Glue Gunners (4,3), Buccaneers (3,2), Banana Farms and Road Spikes. One SMS for round 59.
Fire, Water, Glue With Tack Towers, Bomb Shooters and Glue Gunners beat Archipelago on Medium from round 40 with 9,000 cash. One Meerkat provided.
Red, White and Blue With Ninja Monkeys, Ice Monkeys and Super Monkeys beat Firecracker rounds 40 - 65 on hard with 10,000 cash. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Almost a Zoo Beat Park Path on easy with a Super Monkey, Meerkat, Beekeeper, Angry Squirrel and Tribal Turtle. Start at round 25 with 1,200 cash and 100 lives. Beat round 42 to win.
Ride the Lightning: Part Deux With Monkey Apprentices (2,2) and Banana Farms beat Lightning Scar on medium. Start on round 20 with 3,200 cash.
Pool Party Pool Party Medium with Buccaneers and Pirate Crew. Start at round 45 with 10,000 cash.
The No Aim Game Using one Tack Tower, Ice Monkey, Monkey Ace (2,4), Village (3,4), Banana Farm and Spike Factory beat Park Path on hard rounds 30 - 60 with 6,200 cash.
Icy Valkyries With 1,2 upgrades beat rounds 30-45 on The Rink Apopalypse. No Super Monkeys. 50 Lives, 6,000 cash.
Self-Serving Only towers capable of attacking all bloon types are allowed. Upgrade paths are limited by that. Rounds 30 - 65. 5,000 cash.
High Explosive Rounds With Sniper Monkeys and 2,2 Bomb Shooters beat Fireworks on Easy. Start on round 35 with 8,000 cash. 100 Lives.
Widespread Malfunction Beat Switch on hard with limited technology. Super Monkeys and Boomerang Monkeys 4,2, Dart Monkeys 2,4. Start on round 50 with 29,000 cash.
The Skewed RBE Monkey Lane easy. 65 Lives. All towers available. What's the catch?
Rebuild the Ark Pass Snake River on hard with only Boomerang Monkeys, Ice Monkeys, Monkey Aces, Super Monkeys and Dartlings. No More than 2 of each. Start at round 35 with 6,750 cash.
I'm No Pro Bloon Circles with Monkey Aces (0,4), Ice Monkeys (0,0), Sniper Monkeys and Boomerang Monkeys (2,2). Medium difficulty. Rounds 35 - 55 with 8,250 cash.
The Three Monkeyteers Clock, medium difficulty with three monkey towers and only one of each type. Rounds 35 - 55 with 7,250 cash.
The Switched RBE Switch medium. All towers available. 1,300 starting cash. Reds are blues, blues are reds and alternating like that all the way up.
Frozen Morterstrom With Tack Towers, Ice Monkeys and Mortar Monkeys beat Monkey Lane hard. Start at round 45 with 14,000 cash.
The Best Super-Glue in Town With one Super Monkey, Glue Gunner and Village beat Bloon Circles medium. Start at round 30 with 7,400 cash.
FIRING MA LAZAH! Mount Magma Apopalypse. Super Monkeys (1,2) Dartlings (4,2) Villages (4,2) 1 Bloonsday Device provided. Rounds 35-65 with 12,000 cash to start.
Two by Two With two of each tower at most, and only the two towers every other row of the tower selection screen, beat Snake River on Hard. Rounds 40-70 with 8,500 cash.
Two By Two: Part Two With two of each tower at most, and only the two towers every second row of the tower selection screen, beat Clock on Hard. Rounds 40-70 with 9,100 cash.
Pink and Yellow, Purple... Castle? Beat Castle rounds 30 - 55 with only towers that can be purple. Start with 15,000 cash. Lots of bloons are now pink and yellow, some are ceramic.
Two Time, Bloon Time Beat The Rink medium to round 50. No Super Monkeys or Banana Farms. Only two of each tower. All bloons are two ranks higher. 1,100 cash to start.
They Need to Sort Out Their Priorities Lightning Scar 50 - 62 on hard. Start with 17,500 cash. Only 2 of each tower without target priorities.
Precision Pineapples The only way to pop leads is with Exploding Pineapples. Otherwise beat rounds 28 - 60 on Monkey Lane hard. Start with 4,200 cash.
Defensive Line Beat Park Path on Medium from round 25. No more than five towers at once and only one of each. No Exploding Pineapples or Road Spikes. Start with 2,200 cash.
Beach-Side Picnic With Dart Monkeys, Tack Towers (2,4), Ninja Monkeys and Spike Factories beat Archipelago on medium. Three of each at most. Start at round 32 with 8,000 cash.
Four-Port Switch Beat Switch to round 60 using four of each tower. Dart Monkeys, Sniper Monkeys, Boomerang Monkeys (2,4) and Mortar Monkeys. Start at round 32 with 7,150 cash.
Wind, Plane and Glue Pass Snake River medium to round 60 with Glue Gunners, Monkey Aces and Monkey Apprentices (4,2). Only 3 of each. Start at round 32 with 6,800 cash.
That's No Dart-agnan Beat round 50 on Switch Deflation using no more than 3 of each tower. Dart Monkeys, Glue Gunners (2,4) and Villages.
Tack Attack With Tack Towers, Spike Factories and Road Spikes beat Lightning Scar easy, rounds 40 - 60. Start with 10,500 cash.
Explosive Ordnance With 4 towers at most, and only 1 of each, beat Archipelago on medium from round 30. Only towers with explosives are available. Start with 6,500 cash.
Circles Circles With Dart Monkeys, Boomerang Monkeys, Ninja Monkeys and Monkey Apprentices beat Bloon Circles on medium. Only two of each monkey. Start at round 30 with 6,500 cash.
Special! Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Support Monkeys With (2,2) Dart Monkeys to hold the bloons off, use Banana Farms to get Super Monkeys. Clock easy to round 40. Pineapples available.
Brick and Mortar With Mortar Monkeys, Villages and Banana Farms beat Mount Magma medium. Rounds 35 - 50 with 12,500 cash and a Tribal Turtle.
Super Bomb Factory Using Bomb Shooters, Super Monkeys and Spike Factories beat Monkey Lane medium. Start at round 30 with 6,000 cash. Only 2 of each tower.
Overzealous Explosives Disposal Beat Snake River medium without towers that use explosive ammo. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
Everything You Need With Ninja Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Villages and Banana Farms beat The Rink hard. Rounds 30 - 65 with 5,000 cash.
Special!: 2 Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Chase-A-Bloon Pass Bloon Circles on Hard using Boomerang Monkeys, Ninja Monkeys, Aces and Villages all limited to (4,2). Start at round 35 with 8,000 cash.
Super Monkey Squad With 6 towers Beat Snake River on hard to round 65. Start at round 25 with 18000 cash. Bloons are stronger. Super Monkeys (2,3) and Villages only.
Organic Warfare Using only fruit and towers that use fruit, beat Park Path on medium. Start at round 45 with 9,000 cash.
The Explosives Union Annoyed that explosives aren't required for lead bloons, the Explosive Union has stepped in. The only way to pop leads is with explosives. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
Playing With Fire Beat Bloon Circles on medium using Mortars, Tack Towers (4,2), Spike Factories (4,2) and Monkey Apprentices (2,4). Only two of each tower.
The Volcano That Time Forgot Beat Mount Magma on easy with (2/4) Spike-O-Pults.
Third Time's a Charm Park Path easy. All towers available but only 3 of each. Bloons are 3 ranks higher. 4,700 cash to start.
Recognition With the towers and upgrades that are less used, beat Clock on medium. Start at round 25 with 3,500 cash.
Restricted War-zone With two of each Sniper Monkeys, Mortar Monkeys and Monkey Aces, all limited to (2,3), beat Archipelago on easy.
Crazy Eights Using towers that shoot eight shots, and with only eight towers at most, beat Monkey Lane on Medium. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
The Forgotten Duo Using Glue Gunners, Villages and Ice Monkeys beat The Rink on easy to round 45. Max towers = 9. Per tower = 4. 800 cash to start.
Special!: 3 Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Diamond Dust Ice Monkeys, Villages (2,2) and Boomerang Monkeys (1,1). Rounds 10 - 50 on Monkey Lane medium. Altered bloon levels (no MOAB class). 3,000 cash to start.
Supply Convoy With 3 Buccaneers (4,2), Pirate Crew (4,2), Sniper Monkeys (2,4), Dartlings and Bomb Shooters hold off a deadly bloon force on Archipelago. Rounds 20-65. Start with 4,200 cash.
Black and White With Bomb Shooters, Mortar Monkeys and Ice Monkeys beat the rink on medium. Start at round 30 with 4,000 cash.
Investment Cap Can you pass Clock medium without upgrades that cost more than the initial tower cost? Underrated1 wants to know. Start at round 25 with 4,000 cash.
Something Blue Towers with blue, bloons with blue and a track almost entirely blue. Rounds 20 - 60 with 5,000 cash to start.
The Weird RBE Beat Bloon Circles on hard with a really weird RBE. Rounds 1 - 60. Start with 3,000 cash.
Sneak Attack While on a secret mission, your forces encounter a powerful bloon battalion. With 2,4 Snipers, Aces, Ninjas and Spike Factories beat Mount Magma easy to round 65.
Anti-MOAB Squad The Anti-MOAB Squad has arrived! With 2 of each tower beat Monkey Lane medium rounds 46 - 86 with 15,000 cash to start. One Portable Lake provided.
Go Back to the Start Beat Castle medium with Boomerang Monkeys (4,2), Ninjas and Monkey Apprentices (4,2). Rounds 30 - 59. Start with 13,000 cash.
The Four Monkeys of the Apopalypse Bloon Circles Apopalypse with one of each a Sniper Monkey, Ice Monkey, Glue Gunner and Dartling. Rounds 1 - 40. Start with 1,000 cash.
Chemical Warfare On Snake River hard with Mortars, Glue Gunners (4,2), Aces (2,4) and Dartlings beat a lead bloon force. Four of each tower. Start on round 30 with 7,000 cash.
Stick to Your Guns Upgrades that change what a tower uses aren't allowed. Beat Park Path hard rounds 30 - 75. Start with 8,000 cash.
Short Range/Long Range With a combination of Tack Towers and Sniper Monkeys beat Bloon Circles on medium. Rounds 30 - 55 with 6,500 cash.
Caught Unawares A flanking bloon platoon has caught you unawares. Beat Monkey Lane on medium from round 15. Normal starting cash.
Extreme Farming A ZOMG is coming on round 46! You must prepare for it, or lose. 2,500 cash to start. Rounds 1 - 46.
Round and Round We Go Beat Castle easy up to round 45 with only Tack Shooters and Road Spikes. Start with 1,000 cash.
SHREDR of all Shredders With Spike Factories (2,4), Boomerang Monkeys (3,2) and Tack Shooters (2,3) beat Bloon Circles medium rounds 30 - 60. Start with 8,750 cash.
Everyone's Special Using the three towers with the least bought Specialty Buildings, beat The Rink on easy. Only 50 lives.
Little Helpers Pass rounds 20-65 on Park Path medium using big machines driven by small monkeys. 3,000 cash to start.
Summer Time! Beat Dockside on medium with Buccaneers, Pirate Crew, Ice Monkeys, Villages and Farms. Start on round 30 with 7,000 cash. One Pontoon provided.
Mage-Gunners With Monkey Apprentices, Glue Gunners and Dartlings (2,2), beat Mount Magma medium. Start at round 35 with 8,000 cash.
Three by Three With three of each tower, fourth upgrades locked, beat The Rink on medium. 33 lives. No Super Monkeys, Villages or Farms.
20 Ceramic Bloons on the Wall Round one. Archipelago. 20 ceramic bloons. 10,000 cash.
Weathering the Storm With Super Monkeys (3,2) and Monkey Apprentices (4,2) beat Monkey Lane medium to round 60. All bloons are one rank up.
Six Selection Beat Bloon Circles with one of each a Boomerang Monkey, Bomb Shooter, Ace, Apprentice, Village and Dartling.
Pass All the Rounds! Beat Switch on hard with limited tower selection. One Portable Lake provided.
Where's My Favorite Upgrade? With popular and powerful upgrades disabled beat Snake River medium up to round 50. Only 1 of each tower.
Marina Mayhem Beat Dockside with one of each a Dart Monkey, Ninja, Glue Gunner, Apprentice, Village, Spike Factory, and Pirate Crew.
Another Vintage Using only towers that have been available throughout the entire BTD series, beat Monkey Lane on medium. Start at round 28 with 3,200 cash.
Frozen in Time With Bomb Shooters (4,2), Ice Monkeys, Ninjas (2,4) and Snipers (4,2) beat Clock medium rounds 30 - 60. Only 4 of each tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Sand Sandwich With some monkeys that enjoy sandwiches, beat Archipelago medium. No more than nine monkeys at once.
Don't Mess Up! Round 42 on Bloon Circles easy. Ice Monkeys, Monkey Apprentices (4,2) and Glue Gunners. 7,500 cash, 1 life.
Blistering Sands With non-living towers, beat Death Valley on Easy. 1,000 cash to start.
Near and Far Beat Snake River medium with Tack Shooters, Sniper Monkeys, Ice Monkeys, Mortars and Dartlings. Start at round 35 with 9,000 cash.
Import Bombs/Export Bloons Beat Dockside medium with Bomb Shooters, Mortars and Dart Monkeys. Start at round 30 with 7,000 cash.
Castle Defense With Aces, Tack Shooters, Spike Factories and Buccaneers beat Castle on easy.
Watch Your Step With only tacks, beat Park Path on easy. Rounds 30 - 60. Start with 7,000 cash.
Stars On Your Head The Rink on medium with Bomb Shooters (4,2), Ninjas (2,3) and Monkey Apprentices (3,3). Start at round 30 with 5,800 cash.
Shoot the Moon! Using Dart Monkeys (2,3), Snipers, Glue Gunners, Monkey Apprentices (4,2) and Dartlings (3,3) beat Bloon Circles on medium.
Skin Protection Using towers that have suits covering their entire body, beat Snake River on medium. Start at round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Five Tiny Towers of Power With only one of each the first five towers beat Clock on easy.
No Darts. No Tacks All towers that use darts or tacks are unable to be used. Only two of each tower available. Park Path medium. 1000 cash to start.
Separation of Powers Left towers detect Camo, but cannot pop lead. Right towers pop lead but cannot detect Camo. Beat The Rink medium 25-65. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Close Minded Beat Switch on Medium with towers that have no range upgrade.
Ninja Ice Bureau Beat Dockside medium with Ninja Monkeys, Ice Monkeys and Villages. 1000 cash to start.
Scrooge McMonkey The cheapest upgrade path is always the best option.
Fibomonkey Sequence Beat Clock rounds 13 - 55 with a specific set of towers. Start with 1,235 cash.
Bad Economy Beat Bloon Circles on hard, rounds 50 - 85. 15,000 starting cash and no Banana Farms.
The One Where Everything Explodes With a bunch of explosions, beat Lightning Scar on medium. Rounds 20 - 70 with 3,200 cash to start. Altered bloon ranks.
This Monkey's Got Deep Pockets Only the most expensive upgrade paths for you. You are visiting a Castle, after all.
A Stroll Through Death Valley Beat rounds 40 - 60 on Death Valley easy. Start with 15,000 cash.
Binary RBE 01010101010100. Rounds 25 - 65. Start with 4,000 cash.
Ol' Reliable Ninjas, Buccaneers and Monkey Apprentices are the only towers that can be upgraded past (1,1). Beat rounds 30 - 65 on Snake River. 6,400 cash to start.
The Criss-Crossed RBE Bloon Circles medium, with a slight bloon rank change. Start at round 15 with 3,000 cash.
Across the River With Boomerang Monkeys, Mortars, Ice Monkeys, Super Monkeys, and Pirate Crew beat Snake River on medium. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash. 2 of each tower, 6 maximum.
SWAT Using towers that deal extra damage to MOAB class bloons, beat Lightning Scar rounds 46-85 on hard. Start with 18,000 cash. 1 Lake provided.
A Cold Bunch With Boomerang Monkeys, Ninjas, Glue Gunners and Spike Factories beat The Rink rounds 30 - 60. Six towers max. Start with 2,500 cash.
31st Monkey Expeditionary Unit With Dart Monkeys, Snipers and Buccaneers beat Dockside on hard rounds 35 - 75. Start with 6,500 cash.
The Bloons Go One By One Clock easy rounds, 25 - 65. Aces, Mortars and Spike Factories. Four towers max. Start with 3,000 cash.
One Small Step for a Monkey Use a maximum of three towers, and no more than one of each. Beat Space Truckin' on hard rounds 30 - 50. Start with 3,000 cash.
Burning Rubber With towers that use fire and/or explosions beat Drag Strip on Easy. Start at round 20 with 3,000 cash.
John Monkeyton's Favourites! With John's favourite towers and upgrades beat Monkey Lane on Hard. Portable Lake and Beekeeper Provided. Start at round 40 with 6,000 cash.
Home Sweet Home Beat Space Truckin' on hard with things that are blue and green. Rounds 30 - 70 with 4,000 cash to start.
Indistinguishable from Magic Snake River rounds 35 - 75. Boomerang, Apprentice and Super Monkey. One Tribal Turtle and Bloonsday Device provided.
Drowning Darts Beat Archipelago medium 25 - 60. Dart Monkeys, Aces and (0,3) Super Monkeys. 3 per type, 8 total. Start with 5,500 cash.
Are They as Special as They Look? Using the three towers with the most bought specialties, beat Drag Strip on easy. Rounds 20 - 60. Start with 5,000 cash.
Monkey See, Monkey Do It's Castle medium. You have to rely solely on a single Meerkat for Camo detection. Start at round 24 with 4,000 cash.
Consider the Price Survive rounds 45 - 80 on Monkey Lane without upgrades that cost 5,000+ cash. Start with 15,000 cash. Village disabled.
He's a Frosty One Your towers can pop frozen bloons but not lead; you have to use Ice Monkeys to pop lead! Beat Switch, Easy. Start at round 28 with 4,500 cash.
Lucky 7 Beat Mount Magma medium, rounds 17 - 70. 7 towers max. 77 lives and 2,777 starting cash.
Sit in the Corner With Tack Shooters, Boomerang Monkey, Ice Monkeys and Spike Factories beat Park Path medium. Start at round 30 with 2,700 cash. 6 Towers maximum.
Venture into Deep Space While traveling into space, the monkeys lost a lot of resources. Beat Space Truckin', Medium starting at later rounds with less cash, lives, upgrades and towers.
The Monkey is Always Right Monkeys can only use right path upgrades, non-monkeys can only use left path upgrades. Beat Bloon Circles medium from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
The Monkey isn't Always Right Monkeys can only use left path upgrades, non-monkeys can only use right path upgrades. Beat Snake River medium from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Camo, Right? Right towers can pop Camo but not lead, Left towers can pop lead but not Camo. Dockside medium from round 30 with 7,000 cash. Village and Farms disabled. One SMS provided.
Tricky Bloons Aim your Mortar Monkeys well on this challenge. They're the only way to hit Camo or lead bloons. Slalom hard rounds 28 - 65. Start with 6,000 cash. 8 towers max.
That Special Bunch Start at round 35 on Monkey Lane hard with 0 cash. Use the provided agents to hold the bloons off till you get more powerful towers. 8 towers maximum.
Stealth Mode Defeat the bloons without them knowing what hit them. (4,2) Ninjas, Snipers and (2,3) Ice Monkeys. Rounds 30 - 60 with 6,500 cash to start. 1 Meerkat provided.
Booming In Space Beat rounds 20 - 65 on Space Truckin' hard with Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooters and Mortars all limited to (4,3). 7 towers max. 3 of each. Start with 2,000 cash.
Tack, Ice and a Sprinkle of Dartlings Lightning Scar medium with Tack Shooters, Ice Monkeys and Dartlings.
Resistance is Fruitful Black, white, glass, zebra and ceramic bloons are pretty cool guys. They resist towers and don't afraid of anything.
Speedy Start Drag Strip easy rounds 20 - 60. Lower rank bloons are boosted. Start with 5,500 cash.
Dust Beat rounds 25 - 65 on Death Valley easy. No black, zebra or lead bloons. Limited tower selection.
The Persistence of Memory Beat Clock on medium, rounds 35 - 75, using towers that utilize or create heat. Upgrade restrictions to ensure maximum temperature.
One Must Not Falter Beat Battle Knot easy with Dart Monkeys and Boomerang Monkeys with left path upgrades only as well as Banana Farms.
Snack River Everyone likes snacks. With one of each tower beat Snake River on easy rounds 35 - 65. Start with 6,000 cash. Bloon rank altered.
That Took a While Beat Clock on medium. No fourth tier upgrades. Start with 250 cash.
Ukryte Popy Bloony najeżdżają Wężną Rzekę swoimi najbardziej śmiercionośnymi siłami kamuflażu. Musieli wiedzieć, że surykatki są na urlopie! Przejdź 65 rund z niespodzianką: Wszystkie balony są Camo, bez farm bananowych i tylko 1 życie!
Szybkie Ulepszenia Przetrwaj 5 specjalnych rund na Zamku, w którym pod koniec każdej rundy twoje wieże ulepszają się raz za darmo. Czy masz to, czego potrzeba?
Ful Przejdź ten tor na średnim poziomie trudności, ale jednocześnie możesz mieć nie więcej niż 5 wież lub agentów w polu!
Szaleństwo MOABów $50,000 gotówki do rozbicia 50 MOABów. Czy podołasz zadaniu?
Brak Ucieczki W tej diabelskiej misji ścieżka nie ma wyjścia! Przetrwaj 13 wyczerpujących rund, podczas gdy Bloons krążą, dopóki nie zostaną wystrzelone. Masz 30 sekund na ich zniszczenie, w przeciwnym razie co sekundę będziesz tracić życie.
Chroń Małpie Miasto Bloony zlokalizowały Miasto Małp i atakują na dwóch frontach. Każdy bloon, który dotknie miasta, kosztuje życie, więc twoim zadaniem jest bronić ojczyzny przez 65 rund.
Samodestrukcja Stara, dobra Małpia Aleja, z tym wyjątkiem, że każda postawiona wieża znika po 10 rundach! Ukończ tę misję na średnim poziomie trudności, aby wykonać tę nikczemną misję specjalną.
Tylko Specjalni Agęci Tylko dla ich oczu! Używając wyłącznie agentów specjalnych, pokonaj pierwsze 50 rund na Przełączniku, aby wygrać.
Może być tylko jeden Przejdź Kręgi Bloonów na wysokim poziomie trudności, używając co najwyżej jednej wieży każdego typu.
Pan Czarodzieji Niesamowity 4/4 Lord Czarodzieji musi co drugą rundę żywić się na twojej najdroższej wieży. Jeśli nie ma innych wież, nie może się wyżywić i misja przepada. Przejdź 30 niestandardowych rund ulepszonych Bloonów.

Welcome to the Bloons TD 5 Egg Hunt! Look for special easter eggs on the track select screen and beat that track to collect them. The harder the difficulty, the more eggs you'll win. Collect enough eggs and win fantastic prizes! Three new eggs appear on maps every day, so be sure to come back daily to hunt down all 3. EGG HUNT Collect %(remaining)d more eggs to claim your next reward! You've collected all the rewards. Well done! SPECIAL PRIZE Egg Eggs You've just won %(prize)s! Collect more eggs to unlock the next reward! Congratulations! You've won the Bloon Scrambler! This unique item will automatically destroy the first bloon that escapes during a game and temporarily double the firing speed of all your towers!
Welcome to the BTD 5 Totem Event!
Look for special totems on the track select screen and beat that track to collect them. The harder difficulty you choose, the more totems you'll collect, but the longer you'll need to wait before you can find more.
Collect enough totems and win amazing prizes including Monkey Money and special agents! TOTEM EVENT Collect %(remaining)d to claim your next reward! You've collected all the rewards. Well done! Totem Totems You've just won %(prize)s! Collect more Totems to unlock the next reward! Congratulations!\nYou collected all the totems and won the grand prize!\nThe Totem event will be back soon so be sure to check back regularly! In the meantime, enjoy your prizes! The mighty Bloonarius has risen from the murky depths and only you can defeat him. It'll take all of your skill to bring down this behemoth, but beware; the more punishment he absorbs the more of his deadly minions he'll summon! From the fiery core itself, Blastapopoulos brings destruction to the world of BTD. His awesome fireball attack leaves your towers powerless to stop him as he blazes his trail of destruction. Do you have what it takes to send this demon back where he came from? The deadly master of air has descended from the skies to wreak havoc on your monkeys. Vortex’s powerful air attacks will leave your towers stunned and reeling in his wake. Only the best players will be able to survive his onslaught. Can you? Darts bounce harmlessly off Dreadbloon’s tough hide and only the most powerful explosive attacks stand a chance of getting through his thick armour. Do you have enough firepower to cut this giant down to size?
